alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 12:03PM PST until January 07 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 to 6 inches in valleys and 6 to 10 inches in mountains above 4000 feet. * WHERE...St. Maries, Eastport, Wallace, Deer Park, Republic, Wauconda, Newport, Boulder Creek Road, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Priest River, Dobson Pass, Colville, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Inchelium, Lookout Pass, Pinehurst, Mullan, Orin-Rice Road, Flowery Trail Road, Kellogg, Northport, Kettle Falls, Fruitland, Chewelah, Chesaw Road, Bonners Ferry, Athol, Osburn, Clark Fork, Fernwood, Fourth Of July Pass, Sandpoint, Metaline Falls, Metaline, Sherman Pass, Tiger, Springdale-Hunters Road, and Ione. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions through the weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
